original_text: The length of the court shall be an hundred cubits, and the breadth fifty every where, and the height five cubits of fine twined linen, and their sockets of brass.
korean_text: 뜰의 길이는 백 규빗이요 너비는 쉰 규빗이요 세마포 휘장의 높이는 다섯 규빗이요 그 받침은 놋이며

sentences.original_text: The length of the court shall be an hundred cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰의 길이는 백 규빗이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the breadth fifty every where
